one_phrase_summary.description: A one-sentence summary of the webpage's content and purpose.

summary.description: A brief description of the webpage's structure, purpose, and key features.

categories.description: Suggested categories for this webpage as if it were part of a blog.

functionality.description: An array describing the potential functionalities and use cases of the element.

media_files_description.description: A description of what the main images or videos on the webpage might contain. Can be null if not applicable.

key_words.description: A list of keywords or phrases relevant to the webpage, focusing on what users might search for.

curiosities.description: Any remarkable aspects that make this webpage unique and important. Can be null if not applicable.

accessibility.description: Accessibility features or considerations for the webpage. Can be null if not applicable.

user_experience.description: A summary of how users might interact with the webpage, including navigation, form interactions, and key content areas.

advertisements.description: Information related to advertisements on the webpage. Can be null if not applicable.

seo_considerations.description: Elements or practices on the webpage that might impact its search engine optimization (SEO).

additional_notes.description: Extra information relevant to understanding the webpage. Can be null if not applicable.
